meanings.definition: A type of extinct reptile that lived during the Paleozoic era.
meanings.sent1: The pelycosaur was a fascinating creature from long ago.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered a well-preserved pelycosaur fossil.
meanings.sent3: The pelycosaur decided to throw a party for all its prehistoric friends.
meanings.sent4: Her love for history was as ancient as a pelycosaur.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit brought the pelycosaur back to life in vivid detail.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a rare pelycosaur fossil.
meanings.sent2: The paleontologist carefully examined the pelycosaur fossil.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the pelycosaur fossil replica.
meanings.sent4: The ancient secrets held within the pelycosaur fossil intrigued the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The pelycosaur fossil gleamed under the museum lights, captivating visitors.

meanings.sent1: She decided to pelycosaur the ancient reptiles for her research project.

meanings.sent3: He couldn't resist pelycosauring the intriguing remains found in the dig site.
meanings.sent4: Their dedication to pelycosauring led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The students eagerly gathered to pelycosaur the rare specimens in the lab.
